value.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Camera Market to Grow at a CAGR…
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence (AI) camera market size is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 12.04% between 2022 and 2027. The market size is forecast to increase by USD 6,498.16 million, according to Technavio.

value.title: Seven Ways AI Can Make Your Revenue Team More Efficient
value.excerpt: Dead, lost or stalled opportunities are a drag, but all hope is not lost. You don’t want to spend a lot of time and effort on them, but with AI you can try to reengage them without a heavy human lift. With historical account data for context and generative AI, an AI email assistant can create relevant content that keeps you top of mind.

value.title: There’s Only One Way To Alleviate Anxiety About AI—Talk About It
value.excerpt: Embracing AI as a powerful tool, communicators unlock a world of endless possibilities, effortlessly crafting compelling narratives and delivering impactful messages that leave a lasting imprint on the minds of their audiences. (This isn't my favorite opening sentence. But more on that later.)

value.title: 1 Beaten-Down Stock That Could Become a Massive AI Winner
value.excerpt: The smartphone market's slowdown has weighed heavily on Qualcomm, but the company is looking to make the most of the opportunity in AI.

value.title: The Last Word on AI and the Atom Bomb
value.excerpt: I’m old enough to have cowered under my school desk. Decades later I learned physics from the bomb guys. What I’m mainly hearing now is echoes.

value.title: KPMG is making a $2 billion bet on AI. It's another example of big changes that are coming to the workplace.
value.excerpt: KPMG advises businesses around the world. It's teaming with Microsoft to bring AI to more of them. Get ready for the new tech to spread even faster.

value.title: Microsoft Semantic Kernel will support OpenAI plugins
value.excerpt: Fall 2023 roadmap for the LLM-integrating SDK also lists plans for plugin testing, dynamic planners, end-to-end telemetry, and links to vector databases.

value.title: This AI-powered content creation tool is now only $40 for life
value.excerpt: TL;DR: As of July 14, get the Write Bot AI content creator Lifetime Pro Subscription for just $39.99 — that's a 92% discount.

value.title: China takes major step in regulating generative AI services like ChatGPT
value.excerpt: China has published new rules for generative artificial intelligence (AI), becoming one of the first countries in the world to regulate the technology that powers popular services like ChatGPT.

value.title: Apple Vision Pro headset to feature custom-designed DRAM chip: Know what it means?
value.excerpt: Apple Vision Pro AR headset features visionOS, the world's first spatial operating system that allows users to interact with digital content as if it were physically present in their surroundings.

value.title: AI can help blind community experience world in new ways: 'will lead to quality of life changes'
value.excerpt: A representative from the National Federation of the Blind argued that the greatest obstacle the blind community faces is attitudes and assumptions the general public make of them.

value.title: Yes, AI could profoundly disrupt education. But maybe that’s not a bad thing
value.excerpt: Humans need to excel at things AI can’t do – and that means more creativity and critical thinking and less memorisation, says academic Rose Luckin

value.title: Indian tech giant Wipro will invest $1 billion in AI, including training all staff
value.excerpt: Wipro, one of India's top providers of software services, wants everyone on staff to know how to use artificial intelligence.

value.title: Protecting Celebrities (Including All Actors) from AI With the Right of Publicity

value.title: Striking actors say rejected 'AI proposal' would let studios use their likeness without fair pay

value.title: AI could help reduce fentanyl shipped into U.S., DHS says
value.excerpt: The Department of Homeland Security says new AI scanning technology could help stop some fentanyl that is being shipped in the mail. NBC News’ Julia Ainsley spoke to Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas.

value.title: AI helping airlines forecast weather to reduce flight delays
value.excerpt: The nation’s airlines are navigating a summer of weather extremes including record heat, rain, tornadoes, lightning and historic flooding. NBC News’ Tom Costello has more details on how artificial intelligence is now helping to micro-forecast the weather to help cut flight delays.

value.title: Navigating The AI Combinatorial Explosion: A Guide For The C-Suite

value.title: Building out generative AI models: Insights from MosaicML
value.excerpt: MosaicML, which helps enterprises train and deploy LLMs and other gen AI, was just acquired in late June by data lakehouse and AI company Databricks for an incredible $1.3 billion. The startup released its MPT-7B model in May, which cost $200,000 to build.

value.title: Actors say Hollywood studios want their AI replicas — for free, forever
value.excerpt: During today’s press conference in which Hollywood actors confirmed that they were going on strike, Duncan Crabtree-Ireland, SAG-AFTRA’s chief negotiator, revealed a proposal from Hollywood studios that sounds ripped right out of a Black Mirror episode.

value.title: Bank of America Is Using AI and Metaverse to Train New Hires
value.excerpt: When you arrive at Bank of America’s new-employee boot camp at the New York Hilton Midtown, you’ll find a VR headset waiting for you. Slide it on, and you’ll be confronted with an angry customer, frustrated over a mix-up with their account.

value.title: Most workers want to use generative AI to advance their careers but don't know how
value.excerpt: Out of the respondents in the survey, 54% of workers believe generative AI will advance their careers. 65% believe that generative AI will allow them to focus on more strategic work. Despite the optimistic look, the workers felt like they don't have the right skill set to properly use generative AI or take full advantage of the new technology.
